analysis.description:
LemoCoin.clearExpiredFreezing (/unique_contracts/0xb5ae848edb296c21259b7467331467d2647eecdf.sol#274-303) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- nodes[left].end_stamp <= block.timestamp (/unique_contracts/0xb5ae848edb296c21259b7467331467d2647eecdf.sol#285-287)
	- nodes[right].end_stamp > block.timestamp (/unique_contracts/0xb5ae848edb296c21259b7467331467d2647eecdf.sol#295-298)

LemoCoin.validBalanceOf (/unique_contracts/0xb5ae848edb296c21259b7467331467d2647eecdf.sol#303-316) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- nodes[i].end_stamp > block.timestamp (/unique_contracts/0xb5ae848edb296c21259b7467331467d2647eecdf.sol#313-316)

LemoCoin.setFreezing (/unique_contracts/0xb5ae848edb296c21259b7467331467d2647eecdf.sol#323-336) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < end_stamp) (/unique_contracts/0xb5ae848edb296c21259b7467331467d2647eecdf.sol#327)
